name: Andre Chabot
risk_description: Lead sponsor of the repeal motion; dismissive of $1B funding withdrawal reports.

name: Dan McLean
risk_description: Primary opponent of density; claims the CMHC letter is open to 'interpretation'.

name: Landon Johnston
risk_description: Anti-incumbent stance; likely to vote for repeal to satisfy base of 'Recall' supporters.

name: Raj Dhaliwal
risk_description: Incumbent balancing ward pressure; needs to see the 'Taxpayer Penalty' numbers.

name: Jeromy Farkas
risk_description: Prioritizes 'local context' over CMHC contract compliance; downplaying the $1B loss.

name: Jennifer Wyness
risk_description: Consistently skeptical of city-wide mandates; likely to support 'exclusionary' tweaks.

name: Kim Tyers
risk_description: Ran on a Communities First platform to repeal blanket rezoning.

name: Mike Jamieson
risk_description: Campaigned against 'forced density'; likely to vote for exclusionary zoning.

name: Rob Ward
risk_description: Expected to vote with the repeal block; under heavy pressure from ward NIMBYs.

name: John Pantazopoulos
risk_description: Business-minded newcomer; potentially open to density if framed as 'Freedom to Build'.

name: Andrew Yule
risk_description: Focused on maintaining federal infrastructure funding for North Calgary.

name: DJ Kelly
risk_description: Vocal warning that CMHC will pull funding if rezoning is repealed.

name: Harrison Clark
risk_description: Supports housing supply as a means to keep local business staff in the city.

name: Myke Atkinson
risk_description: Inner-city representative; supports density to manage urban sprawl costs.

name: Nathaniel Schmidt
risk_description: Legal background; understands the consequences of breaching the HAF agreement.
